author: arj
msg: PrincipalComparator removed into its own class; class made final.

author: arj
msg: Class made final. WikiSecurityEvent gains the event type PROFILE_SAVED, emitted by UserDatabase. The WikiEventSource "marker interface"  added to class declarations for AuthorizationManager, UserManager, AuthenticationManager, WikiEngine. EventSourceDelegate used in place of cut-and-paste code for these classes also.

author: arj
msg: SecurityVerifier adds tests for GroupPermission. Better support for detecting exceptions. Adds tests for adding/deleting Groups.

author: arj
msg: More use of checked exceptions. Authorizer.initialize() throws WikiSecurityException.
